formula.name: Mothbrot 4th 2x2 (aka SimonBrot 4th)
formula.reference: Xrn = (Cr + ((abs(Xi) * ((Xi * Xi) * abs(Xi))) + (( - 1 * ((abs(Xi) * ((Xr * Xr) * abs(Xi))) + (abs(Xr) * ((Xi * Xi) * abs(Xr))))) + (( - 4 * (abs(Xi) * (Xi * (Xr * abs(Xr))))) + (abs(Xr) * ((Xr * Xr) * abs(Xr))))))); Xin = (Ci + (( - 2 * (abs(Xi) * (Xi * (Xr * abs(Xi))))) + ((2 * (abs(Xr) * (Xi * (Xr * abs(Xr))))) + (( - 2 * (abs(Xi) * ((Xi * Xi) * abs(Xr)))) + (2 * (abs(Xi) * ((Xr * Xr) * abs(Xr))))))));
formula.perturbation: xrn = (cr + ((abs(Xi) * (((Xi * Xi) * diffabs(Xi,xi)) + ((xi * xi) * abs((Xi + xi))))) + ((abs(Xr) * (((Xr * Xr) * diffabs(Xr,xr)) + ((xr * xr) * abs((Xr + xr))))) + ((abs((Xi + xi)) * (diffabs(Xi,xi) * ((Xi * Xi) + (xi * xi)))) + ((abs((Xr + xr)) * ((Xr * Xr) * diffabs(Xr,xr))) + (( - 1 * ((abs(Xi) * (((Xr * Xr) * diffabs(Xi,xi)) + ((xr * xr) * abs((Xi + xi))))) + ((abs(Xr) * (((Xi * Xi) * diffabs(Xr,xr)) + ((xi * xi) * abs((Xr + xr))))) + ((abs((Xi + xi)) * (diffabs(Xi,xi) * ((Xr * Xr) + (xr * xr)))) + (abs((Xr + xr)) * (diffabs(Xr,xr) * ((Xi * Xi) + (xi * xi)))))))) + ((2 * ((abs(Xr) * (Xr * (xr * abs((Xr + xr))))) + (abs((Xr + xr)) * (Xr * (xr * diffabs(Xr,xr)))))) + (( - 2 * ((abs(Xi) * (Xr * (xr * abs((Xi + xi))))) + ((abs(Xr) * (Xi * (xi * abs((Xr + xr))))) + ((abs((Xi + xi)) * (Xr * (xr * diffabs(Xi,xi)))) + (abs((Xr + xr)) * (Xi * (xi * diffabs(Xr,xr)))))))) + ((2 * ((abs(Xi) * (Xi * (xi * abs((Xi + xi))))) + (abs((Xi + xi)) * (Xi * (xi * diffabs(Xi,xi)))))) + (( - 4 * ((abs(Xi) * ((Xi * ((Xr * diffabs(Xr,xr)) + (xr * abs((Xr + xr))))) + ((Xr * (xi * abs((Xr + xr)))) + (xi * (xr * abs((Xr + xr))))))) + (abs((Xr + xr)) * ((Xi * (diffabs(Xi,xi) * (Xr + xr))) + ((Xr * (xi * diffabs(Xi,xi))) + (xi * (xr * diffabs(Xi,xi)))))))) + (abs((Xr + xr)) * ((xr * xr) * diffabs(Xr,xr))))))))))))); xin = (ci + ((2 * ((abs(Xi) * ((xr * xr) * abs((Xr + xr)))) + ((abs(Xr) * (xi * (xr * abs((Xr + xr))))) + (abs((Xr + xr)) * (xi * (xr * diffabs(Xr,xr))))))) + (( - 2 * ((abs(Xi) * (((xi * xi) * abs((Xr + xr))) + (xi * (xr * abs((Xi + xi)))))) + ((abs((Xi + xi)) * (xi * (xr * diffabs(Xi,xi)))) + (abs((Xr + xr)) * ((xi * xi) * diffabs(Xi,xi)))))) + ((2 * ((abs(Xr) * (Xr * (xi * abs((Xr + xr))))) + (abs((Xr + xr)) * (Xr * (xi * diffabs(Xr,xr)))))) + (( - 2 * ((abs(Xi) * (Xr * (xi * abs((Xi + xi))))) + (abs((Xi + xi)) * (Xr * (xi * diffabs(Xi,xi)))))) + ((2 * ((abs(Xi) * ((Xr * Xr) * diffabs(Xr,xr))) + ((abs(Xr) * (Xi * (xr * abs((Xr + xr))))) + (abs((Xr + xr)) * ((Xi * (xr * diffabs(Xr,xr))) + ((Xr * Xr) * diffabs(Xi,xi))))))) + (( - 2 * (abs((Xi + xi)) * (Xi * (xr * diffabs(Xi,xi))))) + ((2 * ((Xi * (Xr * diffabs(Xr,xr))) * (abs(Xr) + abs((Xr + xr))))) + (( - 2 * ((abs(Xi) * (((Xi * Xi) * diffabs(Xr,xr)) + (Xi * ((Xr * diffabs(Xi,xi)) + (xr * abs((Xi + xi))))))) + ((abs((Xi + xi)) * (Xi * (Xr * diffabs(Xi,xi)))) + (abs((Xr + xr)) * ((Xi * Xi) * diffabs(Xi,xi)))))) + ((4 * ((abs(Xi) * (Xr * (xr * abs((Xr + xr))))) + (abs((Xr + xr)) * (Xr * (xr * diffabs(Xi,xi)))))) + (( - 4 * ((abs(Xi) * (Xi * (xi * abs((Xr + xr))))) + (abs((Xr + xr)) * (Xi * (xi * diffabs(Xi,xi)))))) + (2 * (abs((Xr + xr)) * ((xr * xr) * diffabs(Xi,xi)))))))))))))));
